name: Beach blast (itch)
description:
Made by Tim Dijkstra for the GMTK jam 2020. 

Game can be played in browser or a Windows version is downloadable below.

Protect your beach and the sand castles from the turtles. Shoot bubbles with your crab to remove a turtle. When a turtle reaches a castle, he will start destroying it. Once a castle is completely destroyed, you will lose either horizontal or vertical control.

If both castles are gone, the turtles will hunt you down!  If you touch one, it's game over. How long can you survive, before the situation gets out of control?

The rules and controls can be viewed in the game.
